title: Spaghetti Carbonara
short_description:
This classic Italian dish combines creamy, cheesy, bacon crumbled spaghetti. It’s quick and easy to make, confidence and speed are key! Here's what you need: 
 • spaghetti - 200 g 
 • eggs - 2 pcs. 
 • bacon - 200 g. 
 • parmesan cheese - 100 g. 
 • salt - to taste
 • Black pepper - to taste
 • Garlic clove - 1 pc.

steps.title: Prepare the ingredients
steps.description: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions, until tender yet firm (al dente). Slice the bacon into small cubes and fry until crispy. Grate the parmesan cheese.

steps.title: Sauce preparation
steps.description: In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs, then add in the parmesan, a pinch of salt and black pepper, whisk until well combined.

steps.title: Combining the dish
steps.description: Drain the spaghetti, reserving some pasta water, and add the spaghetti to the pan with bacon, turn the heat off, add the egg and cheese mixture and quickly toss everything together. Add pasta water if needed.

steps.title: Serving
steps.description: Serve immediately, seasoning with a little more pepper, and sprinkle with the remaining cheese.
